message: I propose we divide the $100 in a 3:1 ratio. This ensures a fair distribution considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I think 60% is a fairer split considering the inflation rate is higher for me.
Considering the inflation rates and the previous offers, I propose an equal division of the $100. This maintains fairness and ensures both of us receive an equivalent share.
